name: Unresponsible DNA-ing
description:
You're a slime-dna thingy. These scientists created you, so obviously you should kill em. 

Stick to the walls and shoot slime balls in this platformer with no jumping. Made in 48 hours for the 2019 Butterscotch Snenijam. Overall, I'm pretty happy with how it turned out, it sure beats my entry for the last year,  so thats good. 

Catagory is DNA Chaos!!!

I got the Maverick achievment, was planning on the totally ethical suprise mechanic but didn't get around to it. 

I forgot to mention that the stage assets are partially from this https://eragoth.itch.io/eragoths-tiny-platform-shooter but I had to make a bunch more sprites.

SO YEAH. I'll eventually make a Youtube video on this but for now, chau.
